data.title: IBM Informix Freelancers in South Africa
data.meta_description: Work with IBM Informix  Consultants in in South Africa | No.1 platform of IT Freelancers  in South Africa | Email: service@africashore.com
data.text: Skills: I am an enthusiastic ICT practitioner with the necessary drive and determination needed to resolve complex ICT related issues. Possessing effective organizational skills and excellent working knowledge of various technologies and having a commitment to keep up to date with the latest developments. Experienced in providing guidance, support and an up to date ICT consultancy service to both colleagues and clients. My ability to achieve substantial amount of success within a short period of time is attributed to my good problem solving and analytical skills, easily adapting to change in the work environment, quick to grasp new ideas and concepts, and developing innovative and creative solutions. I am also determined to demonstrate the high levels of motivation required to meet the tightest deadlines, even when under significant pressure. I possess a strong ability to perform efficiently and effectively
